task.summary: Changed setup.py to now use find_packages().
Added a get_brightness() function to IRA and a helper function get_max() which gets the maximum value and index from a multidimensional numpy array.
Temp change for a bug in importing io.fits
Added data_for_pixel(), changed get_brightest() to now be in core.brightness, and added pandas as a dependency.
Created new io module common.py. Contains read() and read_file() function which will be wrappers for all the reading.
Added a 'fits_type' keyword to the read functions. Also made data_for_pixel() sort the FITS files before passing them on.
Added unittesting. Added fits_get_time() in core.time. Added pixel extracting methods, both general but also for FITS specifically.
